Contact_Table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Contact_Table(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,FirstName CHAR,LastName CHAR,EmailAddress CHAR,Password CHAR,CustomerIDLocal CHAR,CustomerIDWeb CHAR,JobIDForce CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,LoginBarcode CHAR)
Customer_Table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Customer_Table(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,FirstName CHAR,LastName CHAR,EmailAddress CHAR,Password CHAR,CustomerAccountIDLocal INTEGER,JobIDForce CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,LoginBarcode CHAR)
List_to_Contact: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS List_to_Contact(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,ContactIDLocal INTEGER,ContactIDWeb INTEGER,ListIDLocal INTEGER,ListIDWeb INTEGER,IsActive INTEGER,IsDefault INTEGER)
Product: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product(ID INTEGER,Code INTEGER,Name CHAR,Barcode1 CHAR,Barcode2 CHAR,Barcode3 CHAR,SearchText CHAR,URL CHAR,ImageURL CHAR,IsActive BOOLEAN)
ProductCodes: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ProductCodes(ProductID INTEGER,Barcode INTEGER,Name CHAR)
Product_Control_Line: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product_Control_Line(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,ListIDLocal INTEGER,ListIDWeb INTEGER,ProductIDLocal INTEGER)
Product_Control_List: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product_Control_List(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,Name CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,CustomerIDLocal INTEGER,CustomerIDWeb INTEGER,IsDefault BOOLEAN,ReLoginToSubmit BOOLEAN)
Usage: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Usage(IDLocal INTEGER,ListIDLocal INTEGER,CustomerIDLocal INTEGER,ContactIDLocal INTEGER,CreatedDateTime CHAR,JobID CHAR,Longitude CHAR,Latitude CHAR)
Usage_Line: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Usage_Line(IDLocal INTEGER,UsageIDLocal INTEGER,ProductIDLocal INTEGER,Quantity INTEGER,CreatedDateTime CHAR )
